class.name: VideoStreamPlayback
class.brief_description: Internal class used by [VideoStream] to manage playback state when played from a [VideoStreamPlayer].
class.description: This class is intended to be overridden by video decoder extensions with custom implementations of [VideoStream].

method.name: _get_channels
method.description: Returns the number of audio channels.

method.name: _get_length
method.description: Returns the video duration in seconds, if known, or 0 if unknown.

method.name: _get_mix_rate
method.description: Returns the audio sample rate used for mixing.

method.name: _get_playback_position
method.description: Return the current playback timestamp. Called in response to the [member VideoStreamPlayer.stream_position] getter.

method.name: _get_texture
method.description: Allocates a [Texture2D] in which decoded video frames will be drawn.

method.name: _is_paused
method.description: Returns the paused status, as set by [method _set_paused].

method.name: _is_playing
method.description: Returns the playback state, as determined by calls to [method _play] and [method _stop].

method.name: _play
method.description: Called in response to [member VideoStreamPlayer.autoplay] or [method VideoStreamPlayer.play]. Note that manual playback may also invoke [method _stop] multiple times before this method is called. [method _is_playing] should return [code]true[/code] once playing.

method.name: _seek
method.description: Seeks to [param time] seconds. Called in response to the [member VideoStreamPlayer.stream_position] setter.

method.name: _set_audio_track
method.description: Select the audio track [param idx]. Called when playback starts, and in response to the [member VideoStreamPlayer.audio_track] setter.

method.name: _set_paused
method.description: Set the paused status of video playback. [method _is_paused] must return [param paused]. Called in response to the [member VideoStreamPlayer.paused] setter.

method.name: _stop
method.description: Stops playback. May be called multiple times before [method _play], or in response to [method VideoStreamPlayer.stop]. [method _is_playing] should return [code]false[/code] once stopped.

method.name: _update
method.description: Ticks video playback for [param delta] seconds. Called every frame as long as both [method _is_paused] and [method _is_playing] return [code]true[/code].

method.name: mix_audio
method.description: Render [param num_frames] audio frames (of [method _get_channels] floats each) from [param buffer], starting from index [param offset] in the array. Returns the number of audio frames rendered, or -1 on error.
